title: Augusta County: L. [Letitia?] R. Smiley to Smiley's sister (Mary?), April 20, 1867
summary: Smiley writes about her headache and tooth problems. She also provides updates about friends, acquaintances, church, and school. And mentions visiting "soldiers graves."
keywords: Arts/Leisure, Church/Religious Activity, Family, Medicine/Hospitals, Patriotism, Women, American Civil War
